Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of De Luca Leonardi Russo's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
De Luca Leonardi Russo is a 44 year old Portfolio Manager from Italy.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: De Luca Leonardi Russo is currently divorced. His children are named Malatesta, Lotti and Fantini.
Education Background:
De Luca completed his secondary education at Istituto Tecnico Commerciale Statale Luigi Einaudi Torino in 1999.
De Luca earned his degree from Normal Superior School of Pisa in 2003.
On top of that he then attended University of Milan, where he graduated in 2009.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 20 years, De Luca Leonardi Russo brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
At Banca Mediolanum S.p.A., De Luca Leonardi Russo held the position of Financial Advisor from 2005 to 2007, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Banca Mediolanum S.p.A. as a Portfolio Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2009 till now.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 160000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns flat in Bologna, where he resides. It is worth 670000 EUR.

He inherited 5230000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2010, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
